topic.title: Response Ending Odometer Reading - conformance rules

lines.i: Odometer reading for the EMS vehicle when call is complete

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.174"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11317)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10643)/@code="67487-9" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --end of call (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10644)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10645)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.22 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11317)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10643)/@code="67487-9" Counter or odometer reading NEMSIS --end of call (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10644)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10645)
NEMSIS Trace: EResponse.22 UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"
